title: DIDN'T GET MY CHEST.
body: so i have a noob account and i been lvling up decently, i got my special chest a lvl 10, but i didnt  get the specail chest at lvl 20. so what should i do, cause i just assumed you got the special chest every ten lvls, i got the special lvling chest at every 10 lvls on my main, but not on this one, if a rioter reads this pls help me, would love some insight on what is supposed to happen.

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and see that you did get your level 20 capsule. It was opened yesterday and appears you got the Snowdown 2014 astronaut poro and Rengar! :D BTW, that poro icon is super cute!

Be sure to check your icon inventory for the icon and your loot inventory for that champion shard. If you're not seeing either of those things, let me know and I can see what I can do about making those things appear for you. :)
so can you explain why i didnt get the the purple champion capsule at lvl 20?

yea i did get a BASIC champion capsule at lvl 20, but i thought you get the purple champion capsule every ten lvls, that what my question was about, becuase i got a purple champion capsule at lvl 10, and i also got that kind of capsule every ten lvls on my main account, so i was a lil confused on why i dindt get the purple champion chest at lvl 20, like i did before
